text: Zusmarshausen is a municipality in the district of Augsburg, Bavaria, Germany. The 1648 Battle of Zusmarshausen took place here. It lies on the Zusam River and is a part of the Augsburg Western Woods Nature Park. Its districts are Friedensdorf, Gabelbach, Gabelbachergreut, Steinekirch, Streitheim, Vallried, Wollbach, Wörleschwang and Zusmarshausen itself. ==Local council (Marktgemeinderat)== The local council has 20 members (Elections in March 2014):Das Wahlergebnis – Danke für Ihr Vertrauen! * CSU: 8 seats * Wählergruppe Freie Wählervereinigung: 7 seats * SPD/Aktives Bürgerforum: 5 seats Bernhard Uhl is since 2014 the mayor of Zusmarshausen. The predecessor was Albert Lettinger (FWV) (1996–2014). Wooden hut with bench ==References== Category:Augsburg (district)
title: Zusmarshausen
